attributes.action: Act on petitions instead of giving us pathetic, wrangled excuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition after petition gets submitted on this website, many which gain massive public support. It's about time the Government acted on them, instead of coming up with half hearted, often confusing answers. It is our RIGHT to have our views heard and answered correctly. 

Stop the gibberish, start doing what WE put you in power to do.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
